item.description:
NICK'S is a new, cool and intimate club in Worcester. The John Cate Band will be playing there this evening. They play all their own original music and are highly recommended. I agree! after listening to a few selections on their website. Very nice : )
Tom has agreed to help organize the evening. THANKYOU! He will provide his cellphone # to 'yes' RSVPs.
So, come out, relax and enjoy some great live music! Guaranteed a good time!

TIME: 8:30pm - midnight
(music begins @ 9pm)
COST: no cover
(donations are accepted)

The band's website: www.johncate.com
item.how_to_find_us: TBA: This event is being co-organized by our fellow member Tom.
item.why: Original music! The John Cate Band
item.name: THE JOHN CATE BAND @ NICK'S
